topic.shortdesc: Finshapeâ€™s main product is a custom Digital Banking solution. Custom in this context refers to a specific configuration of the provided building blocks (functional capabilities) combined with developing front-end applications and component extensions. These building blocks are not standalone products but rather DBOS infrastructure elements, DBOS components, connectors (APIs), tools, and applications from which the final product can be assembled.
